name: Mezmo
headline: Observability platform to control all of your log data
description:
Mezmo, formerly LogDNA, is an observability platform to manage and take action on your data. It ingests, processes, and routes log data to fuel enterprise-level application development and delivery, security, and compliance use cases.

Mezmo was brought to life by three-time co-founders Chris Nguyen and Lee Liu and included in the Winter 2015 batch of Y Combinator. In 2018 the company partnered with tech giant, IBM, to become the sole logging provider for IBM Cloud.

Mezmo is on a mission to empower people who build solutions that shape the world. We’re doing this by delivering a platform that enables enterprises to get more value from their observability data in real time, regardless of source, destination, use case, or scale. We’re not the only ones working on this problem but we have a few things the others don’t.

We’re cloud-native and know how to make the most of modern technology like Kubernetes.
We have scaled a solution from zero to petabyte scale in a short amount of time, while supporting thousands of active users across multiple environments.
We are hungry for change and are surrounded by enterprises telling us they’re hungry, too.
We have a kick-ass group of people who are thinking about the problem analytically and are excited to change the observability world for the better.
Mezmo has helped some of the world’s most innovative companies transform how they manage their systems and applications. Still, we know that we can help them get more value from their observability data by providing more flexibility and control over how they use it. This will enable teams to spend less time switching between data silos so they can focus on shipping better, more resilient, and secure products.

We have momentum on our side. Last year we saw triple digit revenue growth and added 800 new customers to our roster. Recent accolades include being named to YC’s Top Companies, CRN’s 10 Hottest DevOps Startups, and EMA’s Top 3 Observability Platforms.

## MEZMO PLATFORM
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626ad01a9cdb24810e68c024/66e8677bde9f82483221c3c1_Mezmo-Website-Relayout-Diagram-V2.png)
Telemetry Pipeline
Mezmo Telemetry Pipeline helps collect, profile, transform, and route telemetry data to control costs and drive actionability. 
  * Centralize data from various [sources](https://www.mezmo.com/<https:/docs.mezmo.com/telemetry-pipelines/set-up-pipeline-sources>) via our open platform.
  * Profile data to understand patterns 
  * Apply [out-of-the-box and custom processors](https://www.mezmo.com/<https:/docs.mezmo.com/telemetry-pipelines/supported-processors>) to transform data for better utilization and compliance.
  * Connect processes for complex transformations and operations 
  * Route optimal data to any [observability platforms](https://www.mezmo.com/<https:/docs.mezmo.com/telemetry-pipelines/supported-telemetry-data-destinations>) including Splunk, DataDog, New Relic, Grafana, and Prometheus.


Mezmo empowers Engineering, DevOps, and SRE teams to make crucial decisions faster, while keeping costs in-check. [Learn more](https://www.mezmo.com/</telemetry-pipeline>).
Next-Generation Log Management
Mezmo Log Management leverages our modern telemetry pipeline to improve developer productivity.
  * Simplify ingestion, profile, and transform logs as needed.
  * Search logs so and take actions in real-time to accelerate MTTD/R. 
  * Get timely alerts
  * Create custom charts and dashboards


With over 30,000 users and known for its ease of use, Mezmo’s Next-Generation Log Management will get you from zero-to-insights in less than 15 mins. [Learn more](https://www.mezmo.com/</log-management>).
01
Mezmo Data Profiling
Clarify your telemetry data to understand volume by sources and repetitive patterns. Profile new data sources immediately. Select recommended optimizations using Mezmo’s Recipes. Reduce data volume and costs by as much as 50% or more.
[![Mezmo Data Profile](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626ad01a9cdb24810e68c024/6537b0efd44a250a98dedae2_Screenshot%202023-10-24%20135426.png)](https://www.mezmo.com/<#>)
02
Mezmo Recipes
Select pre-configured Pipelines for common data scenarios. Mezmo recommends Recipes based on your data profile. No need to spend time constructing and testing custom Pipelines. Use Mezmo’s expertise to avoid toil and build effective data optimization to reduce costs.
[![Mezmo Recipe Catalog](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626ad01a9cdb24810e68c024/6537b0f36b044192d90d5ced_Screenshot%202023-10-24%20135442.png)](https://www.mezmo.com/<#>)
03
Mezmo Responsive Pipelines
Stay ahead of problems and telemetry data changes by having your pipelines automatically change states when needed. Immediately adapt to an incident or event that requires focused analysis. Increase your response velocity to reduce time-to-resolution.
[![Mezmo Responsive Pipeline in incident mode](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626ad01a9cdb24810e68c024/6537b106269ef8b0bad5925c_Screenshot%202023-10-24%20135526.png)](https://www.mezmo.com/<#>)
04
Mezmo Edge
Process telemetry data in your own environment with the security risks and added egress costs. Deploy rapidly with a Helm Chart while getting the advantages of a SaaS to manage the metrics and configuration.
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626ad01a9cdb24810e68c024/6538d11af5cc3db775c82245_Mezmo-edge.png)](https://www.mezmo.com/<#>)
05
Pipelines s as Code
Optimize your pipelines as part of your development process. Archive and version for easy tracking and rollback. Collaborate for tailored release pipelines. Harness Terraform for scalable deployment. Boost your development speed and maintain accuracy.
[![Terraform code to automate Mezmo Pipeline deployment](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/626ad01a9cdb24810e68c024/6537b11a68affd4358831165_Screenshot%202023-10-24%20135608.png)](https://www.mezmo.com/<#>)

Telemetry Pipeline
Mezmo Telemetry Pipeline helps collect, profile, transform, and route telemetry data to control costs and drive actionability. 
  * Centralize data from various sources⟨85⟩ via our open platform.
  * Profile data to understand patterns 
  * Apply out-of-the-box and custom processors⟨86⟩ to transform data for better utilization and compliance.
  * Connect processes for complex transformations and operations 
  * Route optimal data to any observability platforms⟨87⟩ including Splunk, DataDog, New Relic, Grafana, and Prometheus.


Mezmo empowers Engineering, DevOps, and SRE teams to make crucial decisions faster, while keeping costs in-check. Learn more⟨8⟩.
Next-Generation Log Management
Mezmo Log Management leverages our modern telemetry pipeline to improve developer productivity.
  * Simplify ingestion, profile, and transform logs as needed.
  * Search logs so and take actions in real-time to accelerate MTTD/R. 
  * Get timely alerts
  * Create custom charts and dashboards


With over 30,000 users and known for its ease of use, Mezmo’s Next-Generation Log Management will get you from zero-to-insights in less than 15 mins. Learn more⟨15⟩.

generated_description:
### Mezmo: Elevating Observability with Data Control

**Overview:**
Founded in 2015 as LogDNA and later rebranded to Mezmo, the company has emerged as a leading observability platform, centered on managing and leveraging log data for enterprises. With its roots in Silicon Valley, Mezmo is positioned in San Jose, CA, housing a dedicated team of about 172 employees.

**Mission:**
Mezmo is on a mission to empower developers and engineers by providing a robust platform that transforms data into actionable insights. This platform supports companies by enhancing their application development, delivery processes, security protocols, and compliance measures.

**Founders and Background:**
The company was co-founded by Chris Nguyen and Lee Liu, notable figures in the tech startup landscape. Their journey began with their inclusion in the Winter 2015 Y Combinator batch, a prestigious accelerator known for launching successful tech companies. In 2018, Mezmo solidified its standing when it partnered with IBM to become the exclusive logging provider for IBM Cloud.

**Key Offerings:**
1. **Telemetry Pipeline:** Mezmo's Telemetry Pipeline aggregates, profiles, and routes telemetry data from various sources to optimize usage and reduce costs. It allows seamless integration with popular observability platforms like Splunk, Datadog, and Grafana.
   
2. **Log Management:** The platform provides next-gen log management capabilities, enabling users to simplify log ingestion, create custom alerts, and analyze data in real-time.
   
3. **Data Profiling and Recipes:** Mezmo offers tools to profile data effectively, allowing users to identify repetitive patterns and recommend optimizations, which can lead to significant cost reductions.

4. **Responsive Pipelines:** These adaptive pipelines automatically adjust to changing telemetry conditions, enhancing incident response times and minimizing downtime.

**Recent Achievements:**
- Mezmo has experienced phenomenal growth, including triple-digit revenue increases and the addition of 800 new clients within the past year.
- The company was recognized among Y Combinator’s Top Companies and featured in lists like CRN’s 10 Hottest DevOps Startups and EMA’s Top 3 Observability Platforms.

**Culture and Team:**
Mezmo fosters a culture driven by innovation and a commitment to client success. The team is described as passionate thinkers eager to fundamentally improve how organizations handle observability challenges. Their cloud-native approach, combined with advanced technologies like Kubernetes, allows Mezmo to offer scalable solutions that adapt to enterprise needs.

**Conclusion:**
In a world overwhelmed by data, Mezmo stands out by granting enterprises the power and flexibility to harness their observability insights. By focusing on reducing log volumes and maximizing data effectiveness, they enable teams to concentrate on building secure, resilient products.

For more information, visit their official website at [Mezmo](https://www.mezmo.com/).
